definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :2Ki 12:6 fissure, rent, breach (Aram. [[בִּידְקָא]], bedqo0 (Nasar.))—´[[בּ]] abs. 2Ki 12:6; cstr. ib. + 6 t.; sf. [[בִּדְקֵח]] Ez Eze 27:9, Eze 27:27; —in as building; temple [[הַבַּיִת]] ´[[ב]] 2Ki 12:6, 2Ki 12:7, 2Ki 12:8, 2Ki 12:8, 2Ki 12:9, 2Ki 22:5, cf. 2Ki 12:13 (´[[בֵּית י]] ´[[ב]]); v:2Ki 12:6 abs.; alw. c. [[חִזֵּק]] repair; cf. [[מַחֲזִיקֵי]] ´[[ב]] repairers of thy fissures Ez Eze 27:9, Eze 27:27 (of Tyre).
